1.1.name: wordpress/twitter-fans
1.1.description:
This plugin lets you display your twitter followers in the sidebar (or anywhere else in the theme). The display is similar to Facebook's Like Box. You can either drag and drop the widget onto a sidebar or you can manually write the following code anywhere in your there to display the Followers Box:

<?php twitter_like_box('Username') ?>

New features:

  • You can now include more than one widgets in the sidebar (for different accounts)
  • The function to manually display the box anywhere in the theme twitter_like_box('Username') now takes an argument, the username.
  • Auto-update followers' list once a day.
  • Includes Twitter's own follow button.

Please check the screenshots
